text: This is a list of Indian Twenty20 International cricketers who played their first match in 2006. ==Key== General * – Captain * – Wicket-keeper * First – Year of debut * Last – Year of latest game * Mat – Number of matches played Batting * Runs – Runs scored in career * HS – Highest score * Avg – Runs scored per dismissal * * – Batsman remained not out * 50 – Half-centuries scored Bowling * Balls – Balls bowled in career * Wkt – Wickets taken in career * BBI – Best bowling in an innings * Ave – Average runs per wicket 50 Fielding * Ca – Catches taken * St – Stumpings affected == Players == *The list is arranged in the order in which each player won his first cap.
